name: The Blight (itch)
description:
"The Blight" is an indie rpg game with a theme and a very special way of playing. If you are looking for fun with a theme different from the rest and also simply and simply "The Blight" is your game.
The Blight is a kind of board game in a rpg environment. The pensonage that you will handle, a medieval knight, will move around the board, which in this case is a world with several islands, navigable by land and ship to move between islands, and where you will have a limit of 40 days in each game.
The objective of the game is to make the most of each day that passes, that means using each day intelligently, going to the places you think convenient, and above all reading and paying attention to the recommendations and tips that will facilitate the game.

So if you want to have a good time, play "The Blight" and discover all the secrets it hides.

What to expect:

-Board rpg gameplay.

-Retro rpg style

-Rng is very important on this game

-Time limited gameplay

How to play:

-Arrow keys to move

-Space to interact.
